item.description:
Bwah ha ha ha! Dr. Horrible is here!

By now, there is a pretty good chance you've already seen Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog, but this showing isn't to be missed. The Teseracte Players, who also do a traveling Rocky Horror show, will be hosting. There will probably be some singing. Most importantly, the whole thing is a fundraiser for Equality Now!

The show starts at 11:30. Tickets are $12 at the door, $10 for Brattle members. It seems like tickets will only be available at the door. I will let the Yeses and Maybes know if that changes. Joss Whedon has a strong following in the area, I don't doubt there will be high demand so please, please come early. Depending on the popularity of this event, I may add a dinner in which case I would encourage you all to buy tickets before going to the restaurant. As always, the Brattle has beer and good corn with real butter.

Links:
The Brattle

Joss' acceptance speech at the Creative Arts Emmys

Dr. Horrible hijacks the Emmys

Equality Now!
item.name: Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog @ the Brattle
